result.eng: They put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ga: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.orig: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dó
result.html: Chuir siad a gcomhairlí i dteannta a chéile agus dúirt siad gurbh fhearr an duais a thabhairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir siad a gcoṁairlí i dteannta a ċéile agus dúirt siad gurḃ ḟearr an duais a ṫaḃairt dóThey put their heads togerther and said that he should be given the prize.

result.eng: He forced her to give up the child.
result.ga: Chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithi
result.orig: Chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithi
result.html: Chuir sé iachall uirthi an páiste a thabhairt uaithiHe forced her to give up the child.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé iaċall uirṫi an páiste a ṫaḃairt uaiṫiHe forced her to give up the child.

result.eng: Don't forget to bring your umbrella.
result.ga: Ná déan dearmad scáth fearthainne a thabhairt leat
result.orig: Ná déan dearmad scáth fearthainne a thabhairt leat
result.html: Ná déan dearmad scáth fearthainne a thabhairt leatDon't forget to bring your umbrella.
result.ponchtml: Ná déan dearmad scáṫ fearṫainne a ṫaḃairt leatDon't forget to bring your umbrella.

result.eng: We cannot bring it in because of how big it is.
result.ga: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé
result.orig: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé
result.html: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá séWe cannot bring it in because of how big it is.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir linn é a ṫaḃairt isteaċ toisc a ṁéad atá séWe cannot bring it in because of how big it is.

result.eng: I can't promise anything but I'll do my best.
result.ga: Ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a bith a thabhairt ach déanfaidh mé mo dhícheall
result.orig: Ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a bith a thabhairt ach déanfaidh mé mo dhícheall
result.html: Ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a bith a thabhairt ach déanfaidh mé mo dhícheallI can't promise anything but I'll do my best.
result.ponchtml: Ní féidir liom geallúintí ar a biṫ a ṫaḃairt aċ déanfaiḋ mé mo ḋíċeallI can't promise anything but I'll do my best.

result.eng: You do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ga: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.orig: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairt
result.html: Ní gá duit seoladh a thabhairt ach má dhéanann tú amhlaidh beidh muid in ann freagra pearsanta a thabhairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.
result.ponchtml: Ní gá duit seolaḋ a ṫaḃairt aċ má ḋéanann tú aṁlaiḋ beiḋ muid in ann freagra pearsanta a ṫaḃairtYou do not have to state your address but if you do, we will be able to reply personally.

result.eng: He doesn't have the authority to give orders.
result.ga: Níl an t-údarás aige orduithe a thabhairt
result.orig: Níl an t-údarás aige orduithe a thabhairt
result.html: Níl an t-údarás aige orduithe a thabhairtHe doesn't have the authority to give orders.
result.ponchtml: Níl an t-údarás aige orduiṫe a ṫaḃairtHe doesn't have the authority to give orders.

result.eng: You will be able to take books home and make use of the computers.
result.ga: Beidh tú in ann leabhra a thabhairt abhaile agus úsáid a bhaint as na ríomhairí
result.orig: Beidh tú in ann leabhra a thabhairt abhaile agus úsáid a bhaint as na ríomhairí
result.html: Beidh tú in ann leabhra a thabhairt abhaile agus úsáid a bhaint as na ríomhairíYou will be able to take books home and make use of the computers.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tú in ann leaḃra a ṫaḃairt aḃaile agus úsáid a ḃaint as na ríoṁairíYou will be able to take books home and make use of the computers.

result.eng: You can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ga: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.orig: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnú
result.html: Is féidir leat cúnamh a thabhairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an dath ceart a roghnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.
result.ponchtml: Is féidir leat cúnaṁ a ṫaḃairt dom leis an stíl agus leis an daṫ ceart a roġnúYou can give me help to choose the style and the right color.

result.eng: They thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ga: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.orig: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirt
result.html: Ghabh siad buíochas le Dia as iad a thabhairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.
result.ponchtml: Ġaḃ siad buíoċas le Dia as iad a ṫaḃairt slán as an gcontúirtThey thanked God for saving them from the danger.

result.eng: It was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ga: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.orig: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibh
result.html: Ba chloíte an mhaise dom é gan comhairle a thabhairt daoibhIt was bad of me not to give you advice.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċloíte an ṁaise dom é gan coṁairle a ṫaḃairt daoiḃIt was bad of me not to give you advice.

result.eng: Along with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ga: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.orig: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadh
result.html: Fara aire a thabhairt don leanbh bhí uirthi an teach a ghlanadhAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
result.ponchtml: Fara aire a ṫaḃairt don leanḃ ḃí uirṫi an teaċ a ġlanaḋAlong with taking care of the child she had to clean the house.
